metadata.title: Teaching
metadata.description: Courses and educational activities at leading institutions

data.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
data.description: A comprehensive introduction to machine learning algorithms and their applications. Topics include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and deep learning fundamentals. Students will gain hands-on experience with real-world datasets and projects.

data.name: Advanced Computer Vision
data.description: Advanced topics in computer vision including object detection, semantic segmentation, and multimodal learning. Focus on state-of-the-art deep learning architectures and their applications in medical imaging and autonomous systems.

data.name: Robotics and AI
data.description: Integration of artificial intelligence with robotic systems. Covers perception, planning, and control for autonomous robots. Students work on real robotic platforms and simulation environments.

data.name: Data Science Fundamentals
data.description: Introduction to data science concepts including data preprocessing, statistical analysis, and visualization techniques. Students learn to work with real datasets and develop analytical thinking skills.

data.name: Natural Language Processing
data.description: Advanced course on natural language processing covering transformer architectures, language models, and applications in text understanding and generation. Includes hands-on projects with large language models.

data.name: Deep Learning for Healthcare
data.description: Specialized course on applying deep learning techniques to healthcare applications. Topics include medical image analysis, clinical decision support systems, and ethical considerations in AI for healthcare.

data.name: Reinforcement Learning
data.description: Comprehensive coverage of reinforcement learning algorithms and their applications in robotics, game playing, and autonomous systems. Students implement algorithms and work on challenging RL problems.
